meanings.sent1: In biology class, we learn about animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: She decided to major in biology to learn more about living things.
meanings.sent3: The biology textbook was so interesting that it made me want to become a scientist.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the depths of the ocean is like diving into a vast biology lesson.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature is best appreciated through the lens of biology.

meanings.definition: The science that deals with living organisms and vital processes.
meanings.sent1: Biology helps us understand how our bodies work and stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on biology to diagnose and treat illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The biology lab was filled with bubbling test tubes and microscopes.
meanings.sent4: Life is a complex puzzle that biology helps us piece together.
meanings.sent5: The intricate web of life on Earth is unraveled through the lens of biology.
